title: Disney Cars Toys Color Changers H.J. Hollis
features: Kids will go crazy for Disney and Pixar's Cars Color Changers!
Cars lovers can create their own custom paint jobs thanks to transforming paint design technology.
These 1:55-scale vehicles change colors immediately when dipped in warm water and then transform back to their original colors when dipped in cold water!
Young auto designers can splash, streak, and dunk their cars to create all new paint jobs!
A great gift for Cars fans, ages 3 years old and up.
description: Delightful, customizable cars deliver two paint jobs in one! Based on favorite characters from Disney Pixar’s Cars movies, these 1:55 scale vehicles change color when they’re dipped in water! Kids will love causing the transformation when they dunk their color-changing cars into warm water and then in cold water to change them right back! Whether it’s the entire car or just the bumper going into the water, the result is a completely unique look! Mater, Lightning McQueen, Francesco Bernoulli and Cruz Ramirez are just some of the fan favorite characters with paint jobs that switch from one exciting color to another. Kids can collect other color-changing vehicles in the collection (sold separately) and build a transforming fleet! Each vehicle sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.
